sys_ui_message.key: By indicating this, as soon as this application is approved, you will not be able to apply for any further reimbursements for this training.
sys_ui_message.message: En indiquant cela, dès que cette demande est approuvée, vous ne pourrez plus demander d'autres remboursements pour cette formation.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: By indicating this, as soon as this application is approved, you will not be able to apply for any further reimbursements for this training.
